titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1370) to reauthorize the Export-Import Bank of the United States.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-282, by Mr. Dreier.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1370 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Specified amendments are in order. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Banking and Financial Services now printed in the bill. No other amendment shall be in order except those printed in the report accompanying this resolution, if offered in the order and manner specified in the report.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 100.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 423 - 3 (Roll no. 469).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/29/1997--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 1370 (Export-Import Bank reauthorization).
